pages.text: A ship about patience and sacrifice. Wait until all conduits are active, or sacrifice some of your own ships instead.

When used on your own board, place an energy conduit. When used on your opponent's board, fire an orbital strike that deals 2 damage to 4 random ships. Requires all 4 conduits. For each one missing/destroyed, one of your ships receives 2 damage instead. Your own ships are damaged first.
pages.title: Active Ability
